introduction: Jang So-pal, the owner of a beef soup restaurant called Daeseong-gwan, is a well-known, henpecked husband. Nowadays, he is more afraid of his wife than ever before, because Seoul Restaurant across the road is doing roaring business. So-pal is also clashing with his wife about their daughter's marriage and the family suffers from being in discord. When one of So-pal's brilliant ideas helps the restaurant get back on its feet and solves the problems of their daughter's marriage, he is no longer afraid of his wife.
